headline: CCI executive director Atherley visits Texhong’s Renze Vietnam factory
preview_text: Bruce Atherley, executive director of Cotton Council International, was among a group of Americans in the cotton industry who recently visited the Texhong Renze Vietnam factory. Atherly was given a demonstration of the SAP software program from Texhong Renze, which accurately tacks cotton as it travels through supply chains.
